pages.events.create.description_placehol: Please provide a description of the event for the community so that we can learn more about it
pages.events.create.format_placeholder: The format of the event (e.g. Protest, Seminar)
pages.events.create.location_placeholder: Where the event is taking place
pages.events.create.organizer_instructio: You can select from all organizations you're an admin of and invite others to join later in the process.
pages.events.create.submit_aria_label: Submit your event to save and share it with others.
pages.events.create.subtext_0: Thanks for creating your event on activist! Please provide all information for the event below, and note that some fields are required (*). First add a name and choose an optional tagline to let people know what the main goal is before selecting the host organization(s). Then add important social media accounts and provide a description to set the stage and tell people what to expect.
pages.events.create.subtext_1: What kind of an event is this? Tell people if your event is for taking action or for learning what to do next, and add a format and topics to make it easy to find. Afterwards, tell people exactly what they'll be doing at your event by listing roles that will be available for potential joiners. Don't forget to add a description in the (i) field if it could be confusing!
pages.events.create.subtext_2: In this section, you can define the time and place of your event. Is it in-person or online? Is this a regular meeting or a one time action? Set the time for your event so that joiners know when they can participate. Location type can be offline, online, or both. For location, let attendees know where to meet for the event.
pages.events.create.tagline_placeholder: A short tagline for the event (optional)
pages.events.discussion.tagline: Planning and review for this event
pages.events.settings.danger_zone_event_: Permanently delete this event and its data

Here's where you can delete this event. Please note that this is not a reversible action - all event data, support and resources will be permanently lost. If you have questions about this event, please contact us on our contact page. We'd be happy to help!
pages.events.team.invite_someone_event_a: Invite someone to join this event
pages.groups.create.create_group_aria_la: Finish the creation of the group and add it to the organization
pages.groups.create.description_placehol: Please provide a description of the group so the community knows its focus and how it works with the rest of the organization
pages.groups.create.location_placeholder: Where the group is based or active
pages.groups.create.subtext: Groups are functional working units for your organization. They help define the specific focuses of the greater organization and give autonomy to its members.
pages.groups.create.tagline_placeholder: A short tagline for the group (optional)
pages.index.activist_section_btn_aria_la: Learn more about activist.org and how it functions
pages.index.activist_section_text: We're a global team of contributors with a shared goal: Let's update how people can get politically active and organized.
pages.index.get_active_aria_label: Learn more about getting involved in an activist organization
pages.index.get_active_text: Discover, participate in and collaborate on events that work towards change. Support in the best way you can: collect signatures, host panel discussions, unionize at your workplace, organize direct action and much more.
pages.index.get_organized_aria_label: Learn more about organizing an activist organization
pages.index.get_organized_img_alt_text: Drawing of fists in a circle pointed at the center.
pages.index.get_organized_text: Connect with people across organizations and movements. Build solidarity with co-workers, neighbors, refugees and others. Understand who supports who and organize powerful coalitions.
pages.index.grow_organization_aria_label: Learn more about growing an activist organization
pages.index.grow_organization_img_alt_te: Drawing of fists raised upwards in a group.
pages.index.grow_organization_text: Take new people effectively from interest to action. Gain and maintain momentum for your movement. Get the help you need from a global community. Seamlessly integrate our platform with your existing tools.
pages.index.our_supporters_sub_text: Sponsorship does not equal influence. activist will always only be governed by its community.
pages.index.our_supporters_text: Help us create and maintain our open-source activism platform. Please consider contributing your skills, reach or money.
pages.index.title: Welcome
pages.organizations._global.resources_ta: Useful links and tools for our work
pages.organizations.create.description_p: Please provide a description of the organization for the community so that we can learn more about its goals and composition
pages.organizations.create.location_plac: Where the organization is based or active
pages.organizations.create.subtext: Thanks for bringing your organization to activist! The following information is requested so that our community can better understand what the goals of the organization are. This information will be reflected in an application for your organization to join the community, with full access then coming after a few current organizations have supported the application. Checking each new organization takes time for all of us, but in this way we can maintain trust within the network. We look forward to working with and supporting you!
pages.organizations.create.tagline_place: A short tagline for the organization (optional)
pages.organizations.faq.new_faq_aria_lab: Add a new question and answer

pages.resources.create.subtext: Thanks for linking a resource to activist! This is how you can keep all the tools and information that you need to get active in one place. Please only link resources that you have the right to share with others. You can learn more about our terms and conditions for copyrighted materials on the resources page of the documentation
